wizard.add_flow.scope.prompt:
Dimansyon flow
1) Global
2) Espesifik pou lokatè
Chwazi dimansyon
wizard.add_flow.team_scope.prompt:
Dimansyon ekip
1) Tout ekip
2) Ekip espesifik
Chwazi dimansyon ekip
wizard.add_flow.type.prompt:
Kalite flow
1) messaging
2) events
Chwazi kalite flow
wizard.answers.path.prompt: Ki kote repons yo dwe ekri? [./answers.json]
wizard.error.cannot_infer_pack_root: Pa ka dedwi rasin pack apati chemen flow la: {path}
wizard.error.enum_choices_missing: Kesyon enum nan pa gen chwa.
wizard.error.flow_path_has_no_pack_root: Chemen flow la pa gen rasin pack: {path}
wizard.error.flow_type_unsupported: Kalite flow '{flow_type}' pa sipòte; yo te atann messaging oswa events.
wizard.error.invalid_choice: Chwa pa valab. Yo te atann youn nan: {choices}
wizard.error.invalid_utf8_input: Antre a pa yon UTF-8 valab.
wizard.error.team_id_required: ID ekip obligatwa pou flow ekip espesifik.
wizard.error.tenant_id_required: ID lokatè obligatwa pou flow espesifik pou lokatè.
wizard.flow.delete.confirm.prompt:
Efase flow?
1) Non
2) Wi
Chwazi aksyon
wizard.flow.summary.edit.prompt: Èske ou vle chanje rezime pwosesis la?
wizard.menu.flow_ops.prompt:
Flow: {flow}
1) Wè/modifye rezime flow
2) Ajoute etap
3) Mete ajou etap
4) Efase etap
5) Efase flow
6) Sove (kouri doctor)
0) Retounen
M) Meni Prensipal
Chwazi operasyon
wizard.menu.flow_select.title: Chwazi nimewo flow la
wizard.menu.main.prompt:
Meni Prensipal
1) Ajoute flow
2) Modifye/efase flows
3) Jenere tradiksyon
4) Sove (kouri doctor)
0) Soti
Chwazi aksyon
wizard.save.discarded: Chanjman ki pa t sove yo te jete.
wizard.save.dry_run_done: Dry-run fini: chanjman flow yo pa t ekri.
wizard.save.no_changes: Pa gen chanjman annatant pou sove.

Mete apre
Chwazi etap lank (oto = pwen antre/premye nod)
wizard.step.delete.none: Pa gen etap disponib pou efase.
wizard.step.delete.prompt:
Efase etap
Chwazi id etap (oswa anile)

2) Pèsonalize

Fikse konpozan aleka?
